overview: King and Jack are hip, slick, and cool. They have written a solid gold robbery script and it ended up in the wrong hands, someone who thought of this robbery long ago. Before they know it, a backstabbing friend, a B-movie hustler, two thugs, and a Russian gangster will do anything to see them not finish their movie: including murder. Everyone is forced to play a hand of long odds.
tagline: If You Can Dream It . . . You Can Steal It
title: Hat Trick
